document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){var luckyDipButton=document.getElementById('lucky-dip-button');var filmDetails=document.getElementById('film-details');// Event listener for the lucky dip button luckyDipButton.addEventListener('click',function(){fetch('https://tsiprojectfront.azurewebsites.net/api/films/random').then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Error fetching random film');}var contentType=response.headers.get('content-type');if(contentType&&contentType.indexOf('application/json')!==-1){return response.json();}else{throw new Error('Invalid response format');}}).then(function(data){// Display the film details in the HTML filmDetails.innerHTML="

".concat(data.title,"

Description: ").concat(data.description,"

Release Year: ").concat(data.release_year,"

Length: ").concat(data.length," minutes

");}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);filmDetails.innerHTML='Error fetching film details.';});});});
